title: Mated To The Werewolf Next Door
description: See all of the Howls Romance Collection HERE.She's on the run from her ex-husband to protect her half-Shifter daughter. He's trying to clear his name after being falsely convicted of a crime. Fate has brought them to the same seaside town, but the rest is up to them.Will he ignore his Wolf's claim that she is his mate? Can she somehow learn to love again?Find out in this classic romance tale with a furry twist!
author: C.D. Gorri
